pages.text: $(li)Endermites are small hostile creatures that rarely can appears when you throws an $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/vanilla/ender_pearl)Ender Pearl$(/l).$(br)$(li)$(l:patchouli:creatures/vanilla/enderman)Endermen$(/l) are hostile toward these creatures.$(br)$(li)They do not drop anything upon death.
